entry.title: Robin Hood - Gluten Free All Purpose flour Blend - 907 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: ADM
Type: FOOD
Price: 7.99

Description
Robin Hood All Purpose Gluten Free Flour Blend is made from rice flour blended with xanthan gum, pea fibre and potato and tapioca starches. It makes it easy for you to enjoy all your favourite baked goods without gluten. Cookies, Muffins, Biscuits, Cakes (except cakes with a delicate texture like angel food), Breads, Pastries, Squares & Brownies.
• Gluten free all purpose flour blend with xanthan gum.
• Gluten Free flour blend so versatile it can be used in your everyday baking.
• Comes in a convenient resealable bag.
• RECOMMENDED FOR MAKING: Cookies, Muffins, Biscuits, Cakes (except cakes with a delicate texture like angel food), Breads, Pastries, Squares & Brownies.

entry.title: Supreme - Whole Dill Pickle - 20 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Supreme
Type: FOOD
Price: 42.99

Serve your customers these Best Quality Pickles Crave to their Taste!

Bold and bursting with flavor, these pickles  deliver just the right amount of tang to accentuate any dish! Perfect for any restaurant, deli, food truck, or bar, these pickles offer the characteristic sweet-and-sour bite and fresh, crunchy texture that your customers crave. Each jar of pickles harvested at the peak of ripeness and packaged in a perfectly seasoned, all-natural brine to ensure exceptional quality. As a result, each pickle is packed with a robust, garlic-laced dill flavor, making them the perfect finishing touch to your hearty cold-cut subs or as a side to your thick, juicy burgers and signature fried chicken wings.

These juicy pickles are cut into consistent, perfectly portioned sandwich-sized slices for maximum convenience and immediate service. While these are great as a standalone snack or for serving on your artfully crafted artisan sandwiches, the possibilities are endless! Offer pickles on your appetizer or bar bites menu, add them to your cheeseboard or charcuterie, or create a delicious pickle pasta salad. As a long-time foodie favorite, these pickles also make an excellent addition to the selection of specialty food items in your boutique grocery store or gourmet food market. Your customers are sure to love the crisp, satisfying taste of these pickles!

entry.title: Barry Callebaut - Easymelt Compound Dark Snaps - 20 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Barry Callebaut
Type: BAKING
Price: 169.99

Callebaut S12-HP35NV-D33 - Dark Compound Snaps

This chocolate Snaps is excellent in baking recipes, and for moulding and dipping, or eating on its own. These pure chocolate callets are easy to melt or temper, weigh, and store, and a divine taste in recipes calling for chunks of chocolate. Made using 100% pure cocoa butter and a dash of vanilla that rounds off the taste with a slight sweet hint. 
Pure chocolate requires tempering to obtain a high gloss for chocolate making 

  • Kosher dairy

Product of Belgium

Disclaimer: BULK MART does NOT recommend shipping chocolate products during the months of June, July, August & September. If you must have chocolate shipped BULK MART recommends choosing the fastest method of shipping possible.

BULK MART CANNOT guarantee the prevention of melting chocolate products, no matter the month or current temperature, even though you may follow our recommendation and CHOOSE the fastest shipping method melting still may occur. Purchase at your own risk.

Should your chocolate arrive melted, often times they can still be used.

entry.title: Bonne Maman - Wild Blueberry Jam Mini Jars Kosher - 15 x 1 oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bonne Maman
Type: BAKING
Price: 19.99

Add a touch of sweetness to your bakery, restaurant, or cafe with this Kosher honey..!

Now your patrons can satisfy their craving for something sweet on-the-go with the convenience of this honey! The name is highly recognized in just about any venue, and their premium selection of spreads upholds a tradition of full-bodied flavor, great quality, and value. These handy portion cups bring the syrupy sweetness and traditional taste of pure honey to your restaurant, diner, school cafeteria, or convenience store. Their 1 oz. size is perfectly-portioned for a single serving, and your customers can even grab them on the go with their take-out meals.

Honey offers a quick and easy way to enhance menu items with its pleasing aroma and sweet, classic taste. It's the perfect complement to toast, biscuits, hot teas, or spiced ciders. Rather than buying honey in bulk jars, these portion cups are easy to serve in caddies on your tabletop or hotel breakfast bar. Collected from sweet honey-comb and containing no additives, this honey provides just the right amount of satisfying sweetness to your customers' dishes.

entry.title: MPC - 15" x 21" Silicone Parchment Paper Sheets Kosher - 1000/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: MPC
Type: Disposables
Price: 96.99

Line bun pans and sheet pans with this 15" x 21" Silicone Paper Sheet Kosher.

Great for bakeries, cafes, and restaurants, this coated parchment paper expedites cleanup and minimizes food waste at your establishment. Save time and resources cleaning dirty pans with this easy-to-use sheet pan liner.

Silicone Coating

Featuring a silicone coating, this pan liner creates a stick-resistant surface which helps reduce food waste, and it eliminates the need to use spray-on release products on your bun/sheet pan. Because this sheet liner protects your pan from grease build up, a limited amount of water is required for washing, ultimately making your pan remarkably easy and quick to clean.

Withstands High Heat

The liner is extremely durable and can handle up to 440 degrees Fahrenheit to accommodate your various baking needs.

entry.title: Diamond - Crystal Kosher Salt - 12 x 1.36 Kg/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Diamond
Type: FOOD
Price: 83.99

Diamond - Crystal Kosher Salt - 12 x 1.36 Kg

A staple in kitchens everywhere

Use this all Kosher salt for cooking and baking, as well as for seasoning at the table. The uniformly shaped crystals make table salt the best choice for baking where precise measurements are critical.

This Salt is the perfect cooking salt for your kitchen, steak house, bakery, or other foodservice establishment. Sprinkle it on top of meats or use it as a garnish on baked goods. Since this seasoning has no additives, you can feel good about the ingredients being using in your recipes.

Add it to salad dressings, sauces, soups, and stir frys, or mix it into brownie, cake, and cookie batters. You can even sprinkle it on top of soups, salads, and other entrees.Thanks to its fine consistency, it will mix evenly into your batters, sauces, marinades, and other mixtures, ensuring every bite is as flavorful as the last. Additionally, since it’s not coarse, it won’t add any crunch to your foods.

By using this salt in your recipes, the natural flavors of your foods will be enhanced.

A staple in kitchens everywhere

Use this all Kosher salt for cooking and baking, as well as for seasoning at the table. The uniformly shaped crystals make table salt the best choice for baking where precise measurements are critical.

This Salt is the perfect cooking salt for your kitchen, steak house, bakery, or other foodservice establishment. Sprinkle it on top of meats or use it as a garnish on baked goods. Since this seasoning has no additives, you can feel good about the ingredients being using in your recipes.

Add it to salad dressings, sauces, soups, and stir frys, or mix it into brownie, cake, and cookie batters. You can even sprinkle it on top of soups, salads, and other entrees.Thanks to its fine consistency, it will mix evenly into your batters, sauces, marinades, and other mixtures, ensuring every bite is as flavorful as the last. Additionally, since it’s not coarse, it won’t add any crunch to your foods.

By using this salt in your recipes, the natural flavors of your foods will be enhanced.

There is no ingredient more versatile and important in the kitchen than salt; ensure you are seasoning your foods with a high quality, all-purpose cooking salt, like this Diamond Crystal 3 lb. kosher salt! Certified kosher for Passover, these coarse salt crystals have a well-rounded flavor that, depending on the amount used, can be used in a variety of ways, from dampening bitterness and increasing a food's sweetness to reducing sweetness and increasing umami in your savory dishes. With its large plain salt crystals, this salt is easier to pinch and sprinkle atop your finished foods than table salt, making it a great way to assure your foods are not over salted. Use this versatile ingredient for seasoning meats prior to cooking, rimming margarita glasses, or making marinades. Whether it's blended into sauces, used for garnishing vegetables, or tossed with your popcorn, it will add an extra pinch of savory flavor to anything you make!

This pure kosher salt contains no additives and contains 53% less sodium by volume in comparison to regular table salt. This salt is made using a proprietary evaporation process that creates unique hollow, multifaceted salt crystals that are perfect for controlled seasoning in your kitchen. Plus, its shape also influences its adherence to food surfaces, providing your meals with a fuller flavor. When your recipe calls for large quantities of salt, this box features an efficient side pour spout for quick and easy pouring. For a utility salt that dissolves and disperses quickly, stock your kitchen with this versatile salt for all your cooking needs.

entry.title: Grace - Virgin Coconut Oil - 6 x 500 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grace
Type: FOOD
Price: 44.99

Grace - Virgin Coconut Oil - 6 x 500 ml

Coconut Oil extracted from fresh Coconut kernel through an old fashioned technique known as cold pressing. For centuries Virgin Coconut Oil has been the primary source of healthy fat for people in the tropics. Virgin Coconut Oil can be used for cooking, natural skin lotion, and even as a hair conditioner. Kosher
